info.name: Eyada Clinic Booking API
info.description:
Complete API documentation for Eyada Clinic Booking System

## Authentication
- Most endpoints require JWT Bearer token
- Access Token validity: 15 minutes
- Refresh Token validity: 7 days

## Roles
- ADMIN: System administration
- DOCTOR: Clinic and appointment management
- SECRETARY: Clinic appointment management
- PATIENT: Booking and profile management

## Rate Limits
- Short: 3 req/1s
- Medium: 20 req/10s
- Long: 100 req/60s

request.description: Welcome endpoint - returns Hello World message

**Phone Format:** Egyptian format 01[0125]XXXXXXXX
**Password:** Min 8 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number/special
